name: usms-analytics-monorepo
description: USMS Analytics - Swimming Performance Analysis Platform

scripts.dev:server: cd server && source venv/bin/activate && python3 app.py
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && npm run setup:python
scripts.setup:python: cd server && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.start: cd server && source venv/bin/activate && python app.py
scripts.test: cd server && source venv/bin/activate && python run_tests.py
